body:
Fixed I hope.
I have let other method `assertThat` that took interface or generic type extending interface.
@mariuszs Can you give it a try ? I'm about to release 3.1.0 this week.

issue.title: assertThat is ambiguous for generics in java 8

repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM

issue.title: Re introduce full Assertions entry point

repository.name: assertj
repository.description: Fluent testing assertions for Java and the JVM

issue.body:
It has been split into strict and  interface assertions to avoid generic resolution problem (#365) but now users have to find the correct `assertThat` in either `StrictAssertions` or `Assertions`.

Let's try to have `Assertions` with all the possible `assertThat` methods, keep `StrictAssertions` as it is and introduce `AssertionsForInterfaceTypes`.

issue.title: [java8] assertThat is ambiguous for Comparable
